channel.title: Unconventional Use of Weapons
channel.description:
In the Half-Life series, there are many ways you can use weapons, even in ways other than how you're "supposed" to use them. For example, in HL1, you can place tripmines on walls and stand on them, you can use the gauss gun to jump higher, etc…
Give examples of how you use your weapons in unusual ways. You can mention weapons from other games as well.
In HL2, I use the bugbait a lot and throw them at the combine to distract them, making them easy targets. It never runs out and you can distract an entire group with them, so it's really handy!

item.title: Unconventional Use of Weapons
item.dc:creator: Vampire95
item.description:
Dunno, I mainly use the crowbar to play baseball with manhacks, the magnum as a sniper (without the zoom actually), the snarks (in HL1) as a terrorist tool, like opening a door to a room full of scientists, sending in some snarks and then closing the door again. With the snarks I oftenly use notarget. And I use the bugbait to make combines dance, it’s awsome!

Read full topic

item.title: Unconventional Use of Weapons
item.dc:creator: TomasWolf
item.description:
Sometimes, I put on god mode and give myself some grenades, then pull the pin and hold down the mouse until I get close to an enemy, then I release…

It’s the closest I can get to a FALCON PAWNCH

Read full topic

item.title: Unconventional Use of Weapons
item.dc:creator: MarshmallowRadiation
item.description:
Dias:

You won’t be able to block melee attacks with the crowbar in BM.

I’m pretty sure he was trying to hint something for any devs that are reading this.

Read full topic

item.title: Unconventional Use of Weapons
item.dc:creator: Dias
item.description:
Radiocity:

PS It will be pretty cool to block melee atacks by crobar in BM 0

You won’t be able to block melee attacks with the crowbar in BM.

Read full topic

item.title: Unconventional Use of Weapons
item.dc:creator: Dias
item.description:
Using a combine ball to shield against a gunship’s bullets.

calhoun freeman:

Wait, wait, I’m fucking up. Is it EP2?

Worker antlions first appear in EP2. Doesn’t necessarily mean you first did that in EP2, it could have been a custom map, you could have used spawn codes, etc.

Read full topic

item.title: Unconventional Use of Weapons
item.dc:creator: Radiocity
item.description:
Also in HL you can fly using a grrenades… but it hurts =\

PS It will be pretty cool to block melee atacks by crobar in BM 0

Read full topic

item.title: Unconventional Use of Weapons
item.dc:creator: calhoun_freeman
item.description:
DenDrio:

You mean EP2 right? Also, just for fun, I would always throw out my grenade, pick it up and run into enemy combine/zombies. I would always laugh before realizing I have to start over again.

Wait, wait, I’m fucking up. Is it EP2?

IDK

Read full topic

item.title: Unconventional Use of Weapons
item.dc:creator: Dias
item.description:
Anybody else try to catch or punt the antlion acid in EP2 when they first played it?
It doesn’t work, but you can grab it with the physgun in gmod at least.

Read full topic

item.title: Unconventional Use of Weapons
item.dc:creator: DenDrio
item.description:
calhoun freeman:

Crowbar 2 antlions while getting bombarded by acid ones in EP1.

That shit was tight.

You mean EP2 right? Also, just for fun, I would always throw out my grenade, pick it up and run into enemy combine/zombies. I would always laugh before realizing I have to start over again.

Read full topic

item.title: Unconventional Use of Weapons
item.dc:creator: Dias
item.description:
jindafrom:

In Obsidian Conflict (mod for Half life 2 with multiplayer), I activate a friendly manhack, then hold it in the gravity gun to use it as a shield and chainsaw.

You can do the same with unfriendly manhacks in regular HL2.

Read full topic

item.title: Unconventional Use of Weapons
item.dc:creator: Darth_Giorgi
item.description:
Using Buggy Tau cannon as sniper rifle with HEV zoom.

Read full topic

item.title: Unconventional Use of Weapons
item.dc:creator: Disturbulator
item.description:
‘Rocket Jump’ using fully charged Tau Cannon

And cooking grenades in HL2: DM by throwing them, catching them with my gravity gun in mid-air, waiting, and launching them at my opponents.

Read full topic

item.description:
In Obsidian Conflict (mod for Half life 2 with multiplayer), I activate a friendly manhack, then hold it in the gravity gun to use it as a shield and chainsaw.

item.title: Unconventional Use of Weapons
item.dc:creator: MarshmallowRadiation
item.description:
Krazor:

I like the quicktime sequences in the original Half-Life where you choke out the HECU with the hose of the gluon gun. You know, the one that connects to the backpack.

Ah yes, that was always fun –

Wait, what? O_o

Read full topic

I read that in Spock’s voice.

Isn’t that the point? :o

item.title: Unconventional Use of Weapons
item.dc:creator: xalener
item.description:
Spockjedi:

It’s possible to use the hornet gun to stop floating plataforms on Xen.

I read that in Spock’s voice.

Read full topic

item.title: Unconventional Use of Weapons
item.dc:creator: av3nger
item.description:
Bloodshot:

Does using the crowbar against the bradley count?

Also, I like to take bullets out of real guns and throw them into peoples heads. It’s much more satisfying than shooting them.

Actually I would just run up to the bradleys like a crazy ass and crowbar them quick…sometimes.

P.S. Double post.

Read full topic

item.title: Unconventional Use of Weapons
item.dc:creator: av3nger
item.description:
Take a barrel over to Leon …wait for the manhacks to just make it through the door, and then blast the barrel immediately…or you can blow the door completely up before Leon even uses it.

I use Dog’s ball as an aide in Ravenholm…it distracts up to 3 or more zombies while it rolls in place. It can also crush headcrabs and kill them. It will work as a crude grenade in burning situations.

Read full topic

item.title: Unconventional Use of Weapons
item.dc:creator: Bloodshot
item.description:
That isn’t really an unconventional use of the crossbow.

Read full topic

item.title: Unconventional Use of Weapons
item.dc:creator: Joe_Freeman
item.description:
Crossbow to crucify enemies in Source games.

item.title: Unconventional Use of Weapons
item.dc:creator: jindafrom
item.description:
(rot)(fodder:

Was I the only one who packed every single friendly turret found up to the entanglement portal room?

“hurr durr alyx don’t save ur dad yet, im got funnies to set up” :retard:

I think I carried all the friendly turrets from an earlier match, into the final teleporter room showdown. I painted some of turrets white from a paint can.

Read full topic

item.title: Unconventional Use of Weapons
item.dc:creator: Mr_Someguy
item.description:
I like using Grenades to clear paths sometimes.

Sure, I could crowbar my way through. But blasting random boxes and boards and whatever into tiny chunks is much more satisfying.

Read full topic

item.title: Unconventional Use of Weapons
item.dc:creator: YouKnow
item.description:
higgsboson:

Find pulse rifle
Pick up with gravity gun
Realize that you already have max ammo
Throw pulse rifle at enemy
Run away

I did this, but with the crossbow in Episode 1.

Read full topic
